name: MinimalistGarden
description:
Visit my Twitter page for more information: https://twitter.com/Hodei_X

In 'MinimalistGarden', you will have to plant different types of trees to create beautiful gardens. In total, there are 17 levels.

Available languages: English, Spanish, and Euskara.

Controls: mouse (left button).

If you find any errors, do not hesitate to write a comment explaining what happened.
